baseText: 21 year old student. 4 years hands-on industry experience. Studying Computer Science & Engineering @ Technical University Cologne. Projects run under the alias Lakur.
recentProjectsText: Here, I will present done projects and link them. For now, there are only two items I can publicly present.

projects.bareos: Bareos, an open-source backup and recovery solution. Here, I worked on the web interface and S3 implementation.
projects.finau: An invoice management tool developed by me. The app is written in Vue, styled with vuetify and the backend is a Firebase Service.
projects.blog: My thoughts and opinions on multiple IT related topics.
